election_record.label: Connecticut 1821 Governor

candidate.name: Turner
candidate.note: Listed in the Original Election Returns as Doctor Turner.

overview.note: Roger M. Sherman received 1 vote as Roger Sherman.

sub_unit.name: Sherman
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Sherman.

sub_unit.name: Bristol
sub_unit.note: Nathaniel Smith received 2 votes as Nathan Smith.

sub_unit.name: Washington
sub_unit.note: Nathaniel Smith received 6 votes as Nathan Smith.

sub_unit.name: East Haddam
sub_unit.note: Nathaniel Smith received 1 vote as Nathan Smith.

sub_unit.name: Brooklyn
sub_unit.note: Nathaniel Smith received 1 vote as Nathan Smith.

sub_unit.name: Pomfret
sub_unit.note: Nathaniel Smith received 2 votes as Nathan Smith.

election_record.reference: Original Election Returns. State Archives, Connecticut State Library, Hartford.
The Times, and Weekly Advertiser (Hartford, CT). April 24, 1821.
The Republican Advocate (New London, CT). April 25, 1821.
